body_html:
@IgMart
For the classifier activity you can change MAINTAIN_ASPECT_RATIO to false, in which case it will stretch the entire screen to the dimensions of the model input.

For the detector activity it already stretches with the default SSD model. The YOLO detector changes the behavior to use a center-crop via a similar MAINTAIN_ASPECT_RATIO constant.

In either case you can verify the image actually being sent to TensorFlow by turning on debug mode with the volume keys.

@jubjamie This particular rotation issue should have been fixed last year -- I went through and corrected the behavior so landscape should work on most devices.
